network_error.title: A network error has occurred
network_error.message:
The program information could not be fetched because of a network error.
Check the health of your Internet connection.

401.title: You are not logged in
401.message:
The program information can not be fetched because you are not logged in to niconico on N Air.
Log in to niconico from the login button on the upper right of the N Air main screen.

500.title: An error occurred on the server
500.message:
The program information could not be fatched because an error occurred on the server.
There may be temporary problems, so try again later. Check the trouble information from the "Notification" button, as well.

503.title: Under maintenance
503.message:
The program information can not be fetched because niconico live streaming service is under maintenance.
Check niconico information about maintenance from the "Notification" button to know the maintenance time.

network_error.title: A network error has occurred
network_error.message:
The program information could not be fetched because of a network error.
Check the health of your Internet connection.

401.title: You are not logged in
401.message:
The program information can not be fetched because you are not logged in to niconico on N Air.
Log in to niconico from the login button on the upper right of the N Air main screen.

404.title: There is no program
404.message:
You can not start the program because there is no program.
If you want to create a new program, update the program information and then press the "Create a Program" button.

500.title: An error occurred on the server
500.message:
The program information could not be fatched because an error occurred on the server.
There may be temporary problems, so try again later. Check the trouble information from the "Notification" button, as well.

503.title: Under maintenance
503.message:
The program information can not be fetched because niconico live streaming service is under maintenance.
Check niconico information about maintenance from the "Notification" button to know the maintenance time.

network_error.title: A network error has occurred
network_error.message:
You could not start the program because of a network error.
Check the health of your Internet connection.

401.title: You do not have the authority to start the program
401.message:
You can not start the program because the account you are logged into does not have authority to start the program.
Make sure you are logged in with the correct account.

403.title: You do not have the authority to start the program
403.message:
You can not start the program because the account you are logged into does not have authority to start the program.
Make sure you are logged in with the correct account.

404.title: There is no program
404.message:
You can not start the program because there is no program.
If you want to create a new program, update the program information and then press the "Create a Program" button.

409.title: The program has already started
409.message: Update program information and get the latest program information.

network_error.title: A network error has occurred
network_error.message:
You could not end the program because of a network error.
Check the health of your Internet connection.

401.title: You do not have the authority to end the program
401.message:
You could not end the program because the account you are logged into does not have authority to end the program.
Make sure you are logged in with the correct account.

403.title: You do not have the authority to end the program
403.message:
You could not end the program because the account you are logged into does not have authority to end the program.
Make sure you are logged in with the correct account.

network_error.title: A network error has occurred
network_error.message:
You could not extend the program time because of a network error.
Check the health of your Internet connection.

400.title: Failed to extend the program
400.message:
You could not extend the program.
%{additionalMessage}

401.title: You do not have the authority to extend the program
401.message: You can not extend the program because the account you are logged into does not have authority to extend the program time. Try to relogin to niconico on N Air and extend the program again.

404.title: There is no program
404.message:
You can not extend the program because there is no program.
If you want to create a new program, update the program information and then press the "Create A Program" button.

network_error.title: A network error has occurred
network_error.message:
You can not post a comment because of a network error.
Check the health of your Internet connection.

400.title: Failed to post a comment
400.message:
Please make sure the content of comment.
%{additionalMessage}

401.title: You are not logged in
401.message:
You can not post a comment because you are not logged in to niconico on N Air.
Log in to niconico from the login button on the upper right of the N Air main screen.

403.title: You do not have the authority to post a comment
403.message:
You can not post a comment because the account you are logged into does not have authority.
Make sure you are logged in with the correct account.

404.title: There is no program
404.message:
You can not post a comment because there is no program.
If you want to create a new program, update the program information and then press the "Create A Program" button.

network_error.title: A network error has occurred
network_error.message:
The block settings could not be fetched because of a network error.
Check the health of your Internet connection.

400.title: The Block settings could not be fetched
400.message:
The block settings could not be fetched
%{additionalMessage}

401.title: You are not logged in
401.message:
The block settings can not be fetched because you are not logged in to niconico on N Air.
Log in to niconico from the login button on the upper right of the N Air main screen.

403.title: You do not have the authority to load the Block settings
403.message:
You can not load the block settings because the account you are logged into does not have authority to load the Block settings. 
Make sure you are logged in with the correct account.

404.title: There is no program
404.message:
You can not load the block settings because there is no program.
 If you want to create a new program, update the program information and then press the Create New Program button.

500.title: The block settings could not be fetched
500.message:
The block settings could not be fetched
%{additionalMessage}

network_error.title: A network error has occurred
network_error.message:
The block settings could not be fetched because of a network error.
Check the health of your Internet connection.

400.title: The block settings could not be added
400.message:
The block settings could not be added.
%{additionalMessage}

401.title: You are not logged in
401.message:
The block settings can not be added because you are not logged in to niconico on N Air.
Log in to niconico from the login button on the upper right of the N Air main screen.

403.title: The block settings could not be added
403.message:
The block settings could not be added
%{additionalMessage}

404.title: There is no program
404.message:
You can not add the block settings because there is no program. 
If you want to create a new program, update the program information and then press the Create New Program button.

500.title: The block settings could not be added
500.message:
The block settings could not be added
%{additionalMessage}

network_error.title: A network error has occurred
network_error.message:
The block settings could not be deleted because of a network error.
Check the health of your Internet connection.

400.title: The block settings could not be deleted
400.message:
The block settings could not be deleted
%{additionalMessage}

401.title: You are not logged in
401.message:
The block settings can not be deleted because you are not logged in to niconico on N Air.
Log in to niconico from the login button on the upper right of the N Air main screen.

403.title: You do not have the authority to delete the Block settings
403.message:
You can not delete the block settings because the account you are logged into does not have authority to load the Block settings.
Make sure you are logged in with the correct account.

404.title: There is no program
404.message:
You can not delete the block settings because there is no program. 
If you want to create a new program, update the program information and then press the Create New Program button.

500.title: The block settings could not be deleted
500.message:
The block settings could not be deleted
%{additionalMessage}

network_error.title: A network error has occurred
network_error.message:
The channel information could not be fetched because of a network error.
Check the health of your Internet connection.

404.title: There is no channel
404.message:
There is no channel available for the logged-in account.
Make sure you are logged in with the correct account.

500.title: An error occurred on the server
500.message:
The channel information could not be fetched because an error occurred on the server.
There may be temporary problems, so try again later. Check the trouble information from the "Notification" button, as well.

network_error.title: A network error has occurred
network_error.message:
The program information could not be fetched because of a network error.
Check the health of your Internet connection.

403.title: You do not have the authority to start streaming
403.message:
The program information could not be fetched because the account you are logged into does not have authority to start streaming on the channel.
Make sure you are logged in with the correct account.

500.title: An error occurred on the server
500.message:
The program information could not be fetched because an error occurred on the server.
here may be temporary problems, so try again later. Check the trouble information from the "Notification" button, as well.

no_suitable_program.title: There is no program
no_suitable_program.message:
Click "Create a Program" button.
Note: You can not fetch the channel program information.

not_logged_in.title: You are not logged in
not_logged_in.message:
The channel information can not be fetched because you are not logged in to niconico on N Air.
Log in to niconico from the login button on the upper right of the N Air main screen.

no_channels.title: There is no channel
no_channels.message:
There is no channel available for the logged-in account.
Make sure you are logged in with the correct account.

not_logged_in.title: You are not logged in
not_logged_in.message:
The program information can not be fetched because you are not logged in to niconico on N Air.
Log in to niconico from the login button on the upper right of the N Air main screen.
